name: my-project
description: A starter application using Electron with Angular

scripts.build: npm run build:angular && npm run build:electron
scripts.release:major: bash -c "version=$(npm version major --no-git-tag-version) && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m \"[WIP] release(global): release $version\" && git tag \"$version\" && changes=$(npx conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits -r 2) && changes=$(echo \"$changes\" | sed '1,2d') && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend -m \"release(global): release $version\" -m \"$changes\" && git tag -d \"$version\" && git tag \"$version\" && git push origin master && git push --tags"
scripts.release:minor: bash -c "version=$(npm version minor --no-git-tag-version) && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m \"[WIP] release(global): release $version\" && git tag \"$version\" && changes=$(npx conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits -r 2) && changes=$(echo \"$changes\" | sed '1,2d') && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend -m \"release(global): release $version\" -m \"$changes\" && git tag -d \"$version\" && git tag \"$version\" && git push origin master && git push --tags"
scripts.release:patch: bash -c "version=$(npm version patch --no-git-tag-version) && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m \"[WIP] release(global): release $version\" && git tag \"$version\" && changes=$(npx conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits -r 2) && changes=$(echo \"$changes\" | sed '1,2d') && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend -m \"release(global): release $version\" -m \"$changes\" && git tag -d \"$version\" && git tag \"$version\" && git push origin master && git push --tags"
